examples: There are many valuable insights in her book.
Hay muchas ideas valiosas en su libro.
His work offers several useful insights.
Su trabajo ofrece varias ideas útiles.
The book gives us fascinating insights into life in Mexico.
El libro nos brinda una visión fascinante de la vida en México.
I hope you have gained some insight into the difficulties we face.
Espero que haya adquirido una idea de las dificultades que enfrentamos.
